name: GIGCO: Escape the Gig Economy (CO-OP MODE)
name_original: GIGCO: Escape the Gig Economy (CO-OP MODE)
description:
Welcome to your first day at GIGCO. GIGCO is the world’s leading innovator in contract employment. Thanks to dedicated people like you, we’ve changed the way the world walks, talks, and shops! As a new team member, you’ll be working in our state of the art distribution centre. Your task is to get the boxes from point A, to point B! Please take care not to disrupt your robot coworkers, as they are the company’s pride and joy. Thanks for joining us here at GIGCO, we’re happy to have you on our team!

Experience GIGCO like never before. Join forces with another player on the factory floor to combine your strength through solidarity. CO-OP MODE brings added perks and win-states to the classic alienation of GIGCO for mobile.  

In GIGCO: Escape the Gig Economy CO-OP MODE, you return to the factory floor to face the unrelenting pace of independent contract work. Try to keep up with the daily demands while avoiding the impending automation of your job. If you make it through the day, make sure to keep up with your friends, family and coworkers over MyGIG, but be wary, the bosses are listening…

CONTROLS: 

Player 1: Spacebar

Player 2: Mouse 

Read press reviews and learn more about the game at www.gigco.app
